description: SuperRare's integration with Arbitrum enhances the digital art experience by addressing Ethereum's scalability issues, reducing transaction fees, and improving efficiency. This strategic growth fosters inclusivity and supports artist empowerment in the NFT marketplace.
keywords: SuperRare, Arbitrum, NFTs, blockchain, digital art, Ethereum, scalability, marketplace, Layer 2, minting costs, transaction efficiency, artist empowerment
title: Exploring SuperRare's Integration with Arbitrum
